attributes.action: account for using 1.2 billion pounds of our money to buy votes in the house of commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was reported by the BBC 11th June 2008 that 1.2 billion pounds of our tax payers money was pledged in deals to M.P.s to win 42-day vote most of which will go to Northern Ireland.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
